#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test!=0){
                   
    int n ,times=0,rem;
    cin>>n;
    if(n<=25)
             {
              for(int i=97+n;i>=97;i--)
              cout<<(char)i;
          
              }
       else if(n%25==0)
              {
              times=n/25;
              for(int i=1;i<=times;i++)
              cout<<"zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
              } 
              
             else 
              { times=n/25;
              rem=n%25;
              while(n>0)
              n=n/10;        
              for(int i=97+rem;i>=97;i--)
              cout<<(char)i;
              for(int i=1;i<=times;i++)
              cout<<"zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
              }
              test--;
              cout<<endl;
              }
            
    
              
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
